```{r include = FALSE}

# Common functions
r_func_path <- "./_func"

# Variables
var <- "temp"
qc_var <- "temp_qc"
qc_var_name <- "Temperature QC flag"
```

```{r, import, child=file.path(r_func_path, r_funcs)}
```

```{r, basic_info, results = 'asis'}
res <- knitr::knit_expand(qc_basic_info, qc_var=qc_var, qc_var_name=qc_var_name, input=input,
                          input_name=input_name, input_url=input_url)
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
